articles.title: Released 2 American Hostages On "Humanitarian Grounds": Hamas - NDTV
articles.description: Gaza's rulers Hamas said Friday its armed wing has released two American hostages, from around 200 captives abducted in attacks by the militant group in Israel on October 7.
articles.content:
Gaza's ruler Hamas said Friday its armed wing has released two American hostages, from around 200 captives abducted in attacks by the militant group in Israel on October 7.

articles.title: Two American hostages released from Gaza, Fox News is told - Fox News
articles.description: Two American nationals held captive by the Palestinian terrorist group Hamas have been released from custody, Fox News has independently confirmed.
articles.content:
Fox News has independently confirmed that two American nationals held captive by Hamas

articles.title: Biden’s ‘bear hug diplomacy’ in Israel risks stoking anger in Arab world - The Hill
